WebStorePricebook.name: WebStorePricebook
WebStorePricebook.description: Represents a store price book used in Lightning B2B Commerce.

IsActive.description: Determines whether the WebStorePricebook is active (true) or not (false). Default value is false.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the store price book record.

Pricebook2Id.description: The ID of the price book assigned to the store.

WebStoreId.description: The ID of the store assigned to the price book.
